channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report X-2024051528
item.description:
Report X-2024051528

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-07T18:15:52+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-23
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: This package contained a 4L glass bottle of n-Hexane and there was a loose cap and 2.5 L of the content spilled out of the bottle.

item.title: Report E-2024050716
item.description:
Report E-2024050716

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-03T15:13:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-16
  • City: MERIDIAN
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that a spill was found inside of a trailer in Meridian, ID. The spill consisted of approximately 1-ounce of Metso Beads, which released from one (1) 50-pound plastic bag due to improper loading prior to arrival. The bag was found with a slight tear in the middle. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the terminal, and the service center manager stated they would handle cleanup with available PPE onsite. The waste was placed into a 30-gallon poly drum for disposal.
